Articles.Content:
Hello! I started playing the demo back in February but that didn't last for too long. After about 5 hours or so in the demo I had to buy the game. Since then I've gone from thinking I needed fuel lines from Mono propellent tanks to the RCS thrusters to being able to go to any planet and moon I choose. I stream the game occasionally on my twitch and have a lot of fun doing so. It's fun showing people the amazing things you can do. This game has been a lot of fun and each update has made it that much more enjoyable. 0.90.0 Hype!

--Newbius Maximus
I admit that I also made that mistake starting out! :-p
